Magmatron:

     "Unfortunatly, we are back on Earth," Magmatron said, hitting 
the nessary keys to talk to Zardus. "No matter, we will soon be free. 
Once we win this planet. Then I will rule supreme over two galaxies."
     The comm to Zardus completed right after the word "galaxies" 
Magmatron spoke to Zardus. "Alliance Commander Zardus, I think it is 
about time you and I had a meeting, face to face. For me to see what 
has become of my project, and how it has helped you. Magmatron out."
     Because of time dilations, Magmatron and crew would have been 
gone much longer than it seemed. In that time Magmatron and an army 
or Xenomorphic Transformers had conquired the main planets of another 
galaxy, breeding new types of Transformers. Magmatron knew that 
Dachande and Cerberus had slipped through his fingers, but not for 
long, at least with Cerberus. Dachande was of no use to Magmatron 
anymore, the prototype was outdated, and he was expendable. Shredder 
on the other hand, well, Magmatron liked him. This would be a very 
interesting war.
